metadata.title: CVE-2021-47009 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  KEYS: trusted: Fix memory leak on object td  Two error return paths are neglecting to free allocated object td, causing a memory leak. Fix this by returning via the error return path that securely kfree's td.  Fixes clang scan-build warning: security/keys/trusted-keys/trusted_tpm1.c:496:10: warning: Potential memory leak [unix.Malloc]
